me.first: I'm Angela, an organized, persevering person, creative, I find solutions to any problem, I love learning, working in team, and to always improve.
me.second: I have a degree in Business Administration, and I have been working as an administrator for more than 10 years. In 2024, I decided to diversify my career path, and I studied a Master's in Full Stack Development. And why web development? I have always loved programming, but I have never had the time, money or courage to start this path. Now I have decided to take the plunge, and I am forging my career path as a developer.
me.third: It was a good decision to take up this career. When I sit down to program, time flies by. I love it!

budgetwise.resume: A web app that I created with my colleagues for the MT, which manages employee travel expenses in companies.
